financial_overview.prompt:
Create a compact Financial Overview image (1200x800 recommended):

Panel A (left 60%): Dual-axis line chart
- Left Y-axis: Revenue (₹Bn) FY22-FY25P (points & line)
- Right Y-axis: EBITDA (₹Bn) FY22-FY25P (points & line)
- Annotate EBITDA margin % on FY24 and FY25P points (include extraction keys)

Panel D (right 40% bottom area): Cash Flow Bars
- Operating CF vs Capex vs Free CF (FY24-FY26P)
- Include boxed KPI: Interest Coverage = value (show key)

NOTE (replacing visual Panels B & C):
- Instead of separate charts for Profitability Waterfall and Balance Sheet KPIs, include in report output a short PARAGRAPH + MINI-TABLE (text) summarizing:
  * Profitability steps summary: Operating Expenses → EBITDA → Depreciation → Interest → PBT → Tax → Net Profit (numeric values & keys)
  * Balance Sheet KPIs: Total Assets, Total Liabilities, Net Worth, Total Debt (FY24 & FY25P) (values & keys)
- Save as dashboard_financial_overview.png and return the paragraph + mini-table in plain text alongside image. Include extraction keys in metadata.

debt_liquidity.prompt:
Create Debt & Liquidity Dashboard (1100x800):

Panel A: Debt Composition Stacked Bar (FY24)
- Long-term Debt, Current Portion, Short-term Debt (totals & %; keys)

Panel B: Debt Maturity Timeline (3–5 years)
- Maturities by year with refinancing risk zones (keys)

Panel C: Liquidity Gauge
- (Cash + Equivalents) / Short-term Obligations — show ratio and keys

Panel D: Leverage Metrics Table
- Debt-to-Equity, Debt-to-EBITDA, Interest Coverage, Short-term debt % (formulas & keys)

Save as dashboard_debt_liquidity.png and include extraction keys in metadata.

operations_capacity.prompt:
Create a compact Operations & Capacity Dashboard (1100x800):

Panel A (top 60%): Passenger Traffic Trend (line + bars)
- Line: passengers (Million) FY22–FY25P
- Bars: annotate FY24→FY25P % growth (show keys)

Panel B (bottom 40%): Capacity Utilization Heatmap (per airport)
- Rows: Delhi, Hyderabad, Goa, Nagpur
- Columns: Capacity (MPPA), FY24 traffic, Utilization % (color coded)
- Include headroom note and keys

NOTE: Remove Revenue Mix donut and cargo KPI from the dashboard. Revenue mix will be captured in the concise report paragraph instead.

Save as dashboard_operations_capacity.png and include extraction keys in metadata.

projects_funding.prompt:
Create a concise Projects & Funding Dashboard (1100x700):

Panel A: Capex Allocation Donut + Funding Gap KPI
- Slices: Bhogapuram, Delhi Exp, Hyderabad Cargo, Nagpur (amounts & %; keys)
- Funding Gap = Total Capex - (Internal Funding estimate + Debt capacity) — show numeric result & keys (or 'data unavailable')

Panel B: Compact Project Timeline (Gantt) with 4 projects and one-line status each.

Save as dashboard_projects_funding.png and include extraction keys in metadata.

valuation_risk.prompt:
Create Valuation & Risk Dashboard (1100x700):

Panel A: Valuation Multiples (bar + labels)
- Market Cap, P/B, EV/EBITDA (values & keys)
- Annotate current EV with computation keys

Panel B: Risk Matrix (2x2)
- Four labeled bubbles: Financial Risk, Execution Risk, Operational Risk, Regulatory Risk (show supporting keys)

Panel C: Compact Sensitivity Table
- EBITDA scenarios vs implied EV (15x, 25x) — show keys

Save as dashboard_valuation_risk.png and include extraction keys in metadata.
